Package org.tinyradius.proxy

Classes for Radius Proxy and reference implementation of ProxyHandler for incoming packets.

RadiusProxy sets up listeners for client requests and ProxyHandler. ProxyHandler handles client requests, and uses an instance of RadiusClient to manage all communications with upstream server.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProxyHandlerAdapter
    ChannelInboundHandler that allows any RadiusPacket type and implements Lifecycle.
    RadiusProxy<T extends io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramChannel>
    This class implements a basic Radius proxy that receives Radius packets and forwards them to a Radius server.
